Disclaimer

Here at Aadhunik Technologies, welcome! We ask that you kindly read our disclaimer, which contains vital information on how to use our website and the items we sell.

General Information

The information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to ensure that all information is accurate and up-to-date, Aadhunik Technologies makes no warranties or representations of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. You consequently absolutely assume all risk associated with any reliance you may have on such material.

Restrictions on Liability

Any loss or damage, including without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any loss or damage at all resulting from lost data or profits arising out of, or in connection with, the use of this website, shall not be held against Aadhunik Technologies. You might be able to link from this page to other websites that are not managed by Aadhunik Technologies. The availability, nature, and content of those websites are beyond our control. Any links provided are not meant to be recommendations or endorsements of the content found inside.

Details of the Product

All of Aadhunik Technologies’ products depend upon availability and are subject to change or withdrawal at any time. Although we try our best to ensure that product specs and descriptions are correct, we cannot guarantee that any information on the website—including photographs and product descriptions—is totally accurate, full, dependable, up to date, or error-free.

Professional Advice

The content on our website is intended to be a substitute for professional advice. You should not rely on the information on our website as an alternative to professional advice from your own professional advisor. If you have any specific questions about any matter, you should consult your own professional advisor.

Modifications to the Disclaimer

This disclaimer may be updated, changed, or modified at any moment without previous notice by Aadhunik Technologies. You agree to be legally bound by the most recent version of the disclaimer by using our website.

Get in Touch
